channel.description: Recent content in Archives on loikein's notes

item.title: Notes on Industrial Organization
item.description: Basic Ideas Firm Consumer Discrete Choice Model Discrete Choice Model: Asymmetric Information Representative Consumer Model Welfare Perfect Competition Basic Ideas Firm Firm: transforms inputs into outputs Profit: \(Π = R(q) - C(q)\) Sales: \(q = f(k,l)\) Cost: technology, expenditure minimization Let \(q = \tilde{q}\), isovalue of production: \(f(k,l) = \tilde{q}\) Let \(p_k\) be price of k, \(p_l\) be price of l, given \(E\), isovalue of expenditure: \(k = -\frac{p_l}{p_k}\cdot l + \frac{E}{p_k}\)

item.title: Notes on Time Series
item.description: Definition Property Analysis Procedure Trend Trend & Seasonality Lag & Difference Operator ARMA White Noise MA MA Stationarity AR AR (1) Stationarity AR (p) Stationarity AR (p) as MA (∞) Yule-Walker Equations ARMA ARCH & GARCH ARCH ARCH Stationarity GARCH GARCH Stationarity Old Stuff Integration OLS Estimation ML Estimation Model Selection Spurious Regression Cointegration Definition Time series: collection of observations indexed by date \[\begin{aligned}\{y_t\}_{t=-\infty}^{\infty} &= \{y_t\}_{t\in\mathbb{Z}} \\ &= \{ \dots, y_{-1}, y_0, y_1, y_2,\dots, y_{T-1}, y_{T}, y_{T+1},\dots\} \end{aligned}\] Observed sample: \(\{ y_1, y_2,\dots, y_{T-1}, y_{T}\}\) Underlying random variables: \(\{ Y_1, Y_2,\dots, Y_{T-1}, Y_{T}\}\) Stochastic process: ordered sequence of random variables \[\{Y_t\}_{t=0,\pm 1,\pm 2,\dots} =\{Y_t\}_{t\in\mathbb{Z}}\] Probability space: \((Ω,\mathcal{A},P)\) Mapping: \(\{Y_t(\cdot)\}: Ω\mapsto \mathbb{R}^{\mathbb{Z}}\) s.

item.title: Notes on Mechanism Design & Social Choice
item.description: Mechanism Design Problem Environment Mechanism Induced Game Social Choice Function & Implementation I dropped this course. Textbook: (MWG) Microeconomic Theory Mechanism Design Problem Reference Environment Set of agents: \(i\in N = \{1,2,\dots, n\}\) Set of possible alternatives: \(x\in X\) \(x\) is single-valued (MWG Definition 21.E.1) Type profile: \(θ = (θ_1, θ_2,\dots, θ_n)\in Θ = Θ_1\times Θ_2\times\dots\times Θ_n\) pdf of \(θ\) over \(Θ\): \(f\) Agent \(i\)’s type: \(θ_i \in Θ_i\) Agent \(i\)’s vNM utility function: \(u_i(x,θ)\) Allow for selflessness Allow for reference Independent private values environment assumption Private value: \(u_i(x,θ) = u_i(x,θ_i)\) Independent type: \(f_i(θ_i)\) s.

item.title: Notes on Probability Theory
item.description: Literature Personal Reference Measure Theory σ-algebra Ring Dynkin System (λ-system) π-system Measures I dropped this course. Literature Probability & Measure Theory Probability Theory and Elements of Measure Theory (Bauer, H.) Probability and Measure Probability Theory: Independence, Interchangeability, Martingales ★ measure A Course in Probability Theory Real

item.title: Introduction to JavaScript
